content.question: The author italicizes the word “real” (paragraph 4, sentence 4) primarily to emphasize that

choices.label: a claim that she is making is obviously valid
many people fail to acknowledge factual evidence
the audience might need clarification on this subject matter
there is a distinction between two commonly confused terms

content.answer: there is a distinction between two commonly confused terms

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
